short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow ChatGPT and Claude to edit your local project files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension allows ChatGPT and Claude to make modifications to your project directory, allowing you to conversationally build code. This is Open Source, and you can find the code on GitHub.
